subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: If Commissioner David Stern puts Carmelo Anthony on the All-Star team, he will have to defy the very image of basketball without brawls he was trying to protect and the one his coaches upheld.
snippet: If Commissioner David Stern puts Carmelo Anthony on the All-Star team, he will have to defy the very image of basketball without brawls he was trying to protect and the one his coaches upheld.
